Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic music theory and reading music.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 1122 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of theoretical concepts in jazz music, including practical keyboard applications.

MUT1121 - Music Theory and Musicianship.name: MUT1121 - Music Theory and Musicianship I

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 1004 or Music major or Musical Theatre major

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Studies in music theory, both written and aural skills, including musical analysis, model composition, sight singing, ear training, and improvisation.

MUT1122 - Music Theory and Musicianship.name: MUT1122 - Music Theory and Musicianship II

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 1121 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MUT 1121. Studies in music theory, both written and aural skills, including musical analysis, model composition, sight singing, ear training, and improvisation.

MUT2126 - Music Theory and Musicianship.name: MUT2126 - Music Theory and Musicianship III

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 1122 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MUT 1122. Studies in music theory, both written and aural skills, including musical analysis, model composition, sight singing, ear training, and improvisation.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 3170 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study of theoretical concepts in jazz music, including practical keyboard applications.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUS 2360C and MUT 2127 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Technical and aesthetic principles of writing for instruments of the concert orchestra.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 2127 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Counterpoint in Western music from the 16th to the 20th Centuries.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A comprehensive review of harmonic and analytic skills.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 2127 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Techniques of analysis for various styles of twentieth-century music.

MUT2127 - Music Theory and Musicianship.name: MUT2127 - Music Theory and Musicianship IV

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: MUT 2126 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of MUT 2126. Studies in music theory, both written and aural skills, including musical analysis, model composition, sight singing, ear training, and improvisation.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Comprehensive musicianship in jazz studies. Improvisation, repertoire, leadership and collaboration, studied in the context of a jazz group.
